by 10.91.69.31 with SMTP id w31ls196774agk.2.gmail; Mon, 11 Jul 2011 15:30:26 -0700 (PDT)

body.para: BTW - Here is one more tip.

It can be difficult to estimate or determine exact building heights in many cases. While sometimes this information is available on the web, many times it is not. When all else fails, and providing the Satellite Image has a Date Stamp on it (or even when there is none, the date and time can be estimated), you can often get very close to the correct/actual height using Shadows, providing you can see a shadow in the sat. image as in most cases. It's not perfect, but it's better than simply guessing.
